name: Dead Cide Club
summary: Dead Cide Club is a fast tempo, side-scroll battle royal shooter that allows you to build your strategy with various weapons, including special weapons. The more you play, the more you'll encounter unexpected strategies and difficulties. As the game starts and playtime increases, you’ll be able to feel the tension and overwhelming psychological warfare of the stylish and cute retro characters. Read the enemy's mind and take action first.
